subject: Unsupported major.minor version 49.0 in junit 4.0
msgSnippet: I had downloaded junit4.0. When I tried to test my intsllaion using command java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore org.junit.tests.AllTests I get a  Unsupported
messageBody:
I had downloaded junit4.0. When I tried to test my intsllaion using
command 'java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore org.junit.tests.AllTests' I
get a 'Unsupported major.minor version 49.0' error. I was running
jdk1.4.2 for this. I could successfuly run the sample test with
jdk1.5.0 . I assume I am getting the error beacuse of the diffrence in
JVM versions. Is there a junit version available which runs with
jdk1.4? Is there major feature difference between that one and
junit4.0?

Thanks
